mapper.select: select a.t_introduce , b.name , a.t_care_type , a.t_cost , r.idx as r_idx , TO_CHAR(r.START_DATE,'yyyy.mm.dd AMHH:mm') || '~' || TO_CHAR(r.END_DATE,'HH:mm') AS CARE_TIME from d_teachercard a , d_member b , d_reserve r where a.d_member_idx = b.idx and a.idx = r.teacher_idx

select k.idx ,k.d_member_idx ,k.k_name ,k.k_birth ,k.k_gender ,k.k_introduce ,k.k_care_type ,k.k_tendency ,k.teacher_type ,k.k_require from d_kidcard k ,d_reserve r where k.idx = r.kid_idx and r.kid_idx = #{idx}
